descriptionHtml:
This mod adds two spell tomes to Farengar\'s office in Dragonsreach.

They will teach you two very overpowered spells that cost 0 magicka to cast.

[b]Dragon Fireball[/b]
A fireball like the ones dragons shout at you. Staggers on impact.

[b]Dragon Fireball Force[/b]
The same, except it sends your target flying

Note:
This is my first mod ever. It was just a little project to get to know the creation kit and I wasn\'t planning on uploading it at first, but I might aswell share since I have been looking for something like this, but never found it.
author: WMG
